detailed_analysis.speaker: Speaker 1
detailed_analysis.text: Hello. Hello. It's last testing for me for tonight. It is 1210 and 2025.

grammar.corrected_text: Hello. Hello. It's last testing for me for tonight. It is 1210 and 2025.

detailed_analysis.judgment: Flawless grammar. Everything reads clean and natural. Not entirely on theme — refocusing would make it more coherent. The tone leans critical — might sound defensive if not balanced. Controlled emotion — maintains a professional tone. Since it drifts off-topic and feels a bit harsh, it might come across as dismissive.

detailed_analysis.speaker: Speaker 2

grammar.corrected_text: I'm also happy to summarize it and also wanted to submit it.

detailed_analysis.judgment: Your phrasing flows effortlessly — not a single grammatical hitch. Feels a bit detached from the main topic — maybe tie your points back more clearly. Positive tone all around — it draws the reader in naturally. Joyful and lively delivery — really adds character to your response.

speaker_summary.Speaker 1: Not a single grammatical flaw; it’s all very natural. Your ideas are interesting, but not always tied to the main discussion.
speaker_summary.Speaker 2: Fluent and clean. It’s a pleasure to read your phrasing. You sometimes lose sight of the topic; clearer linkage would help.
